Headline: #68 Northwest Highway Temporary Southbound Reroute near Northwest Hwy/Devon
ShortDescription: SB 68 NW Hwy buses are temp rerouted via: NW Hwy, Oliphant, Avondale, Devon and NW Hwy, due to, street blockage, near NW Hwy/Devon.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #68 Northwest Highway buses are temporarily rerouted via: Northwest Highway, Oliphant, Avondale, Devon and Northwest Hightway, due to street blockage, near Northwest Highway/Devon.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Halsted.  Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Halsted. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
